fields.Title of Contribution: The Analysis of Nonverbal Communication: The Dangers of Pseudoscience in Security and Justice Contexts
fields.Description/Abstract:
This is an international consensus statement regarding this topic.  There were a lot of authors.  This is the correct citation:

V., Plusquellec, P., Jupe, L. M., St-Yves, M., Dunbar, N. E., Hartwig, M., … van Koppen, P. J. (2020). The analysis of nonverbal communication: The dangers of pseudoscience in security and justice contexts. Anuario de Psicología Jurídica, 30, 1-12. doi: 10.5093/apj2019a9

This article has been or is being published in French, English, and Spanish     Here is the complete list of authors:  Vincent Denault1, 2, Pierrich Plusquellec2, 3, 4, Louise M. Jupe5, Michel St-Yves6, 7, Norah E. Dunbar8, Maria Hartwig9, Siegfried L.
